Chapter 4 Causal analysis 4.1 DAG The following DAG illustrates the casual relationships assumed to be true for the purposes of the study. C: Culture W: Warnings R: Refactoring D: Defects S: Size library(dagitty) dag <- dagitty("dag { C -> R W -> R D -> R D -> W S -> D }") tidy_dagitty(dag, layout="fr") %>% ggplot(aes(x=x, y=y, xend=xend, yend=yend)) + geom_dag_node() + geom_dag_text() + geom_dag_edges() + theme_dag()
